mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, name, password, email, address) values ( #{memberId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{address, typeHandler=com.plateer.homemarket.store.handler.AddressTypeHandler} )
mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, name, email, address, join_date as joinDate, authority from member
select member_id as memberId, name, email, address, join_date as joinDate, authority from member where member_id = #{memberId}
select member_id as memberId, name, email, address, join_date as joinDate, authority from member where name = #{name}
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, address = #{address} where member_id = #{memberId}
